name: Matrix.Extra

values.comment: element wise multiplication
values.type: Matrix.Matrix number -> Matrix.Matrix number -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix number)

values.comment: element wise power
values.type: Matrix.Matrix number -> Matrix.Matrix number -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix number)

values.name: add
values.comment: add two matricies together element by element and return the result
values.type: Matrix.Matrix number -> Matrix.Matrix number -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix number)

values.name: diagonals
values.comment:
Get the diagonal-neighbours of a point (x, y) in the matrix
If on edge, then no wrapping happens - they are excluded
values.type: Int -> Int -> Matrix.Matrix a -> List a

values.name: hadamard
values.comment: take the product of every corresponding element in two matricies and return the result
values.type: Matrix.Matrix number -> Matrix.Matrix number -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix number)

values.name: indexedNeighbours
values.comment:
Get the neighbours of a point (x, y) in the matrix
If on edge, then no wrapping happens - they are excluded
values.type: Int -> Int -> Matrix.Matrix a -> List ( ( Int, Int ), a )

values.name: neighbours
values.comment:
Get the neighbours of a point (x, y) in the matrix
If on edge, then no wrapping happens - they are excluded
values.type: Int -> Int -> Matrix.Matrix a -> List a

values.name: neighboursFour
values.comment:
Get the non-diagonal neighbours of a point (x, y) in the matrix
If on edge, then no wrapping happens - they are excluded
values.type: Int -> Int -> Matrix.Matrix a -> List a

values.name: power
values.comment: element-wise power of elements
values.type: Matrix.Matrix number -> Matrix.Matrix number -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix number)

values.name: prettyPrint
values.comment: Print out a matrix into a table
values.type: Matrix.Matrix a -> Html.Html msg

values.name: subtract
values.comment: subtract two matricies together element by element and return the result
values.type: Matrix.Matrix number -> Matrix.Matrix number -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix number)

name: Matrix

aliases.name: Matrix
aliases.comment: Matrix a has a given size, and data contained within
aliases.type: { size : ( Int, Int ), data : Array.Array a }

values.name: concatHorizontal
values.comment: Append a matrix to another matrix horizontally and return the result. Return Nothing if the heights don't match
values.type: Matrix.Matrix a -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix a)

values.name: concatVertical
values.comment: Append a matrix to another matrix vertically and return the result. Return Nothing if the widths don't match
values.type: Matrix.Matrix a -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix a)

values.name: empty
values.comment: Create an empty matrix
values.type: Matrix.Matrix a

values.name: filter
values.comment: Keep only elements that return `True` when passed to the given function f
values.type: (a -> Bool) -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Array.Array a

values.name: fromList
values.comment:
Create a matrix from a list of lists.
  If the lists within the list are not consistently sized, return `Nothing`
  Otherwise return a matrix with the size as the size of the outer and nested lists
values.type: List (List a) -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix a)

values.name: get
values.comment:
Get a value from a given `x y` and return `Just v` if it exists
  Otherwise `Nothing`
values.type: Int -> Int -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Maybe.Maybe a

values.name: getColumn
values.comment: Get a row at a given i
values.type: Int -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Maybe.Maybe (Array.Array a)

values.name: getRow
values.comment: Get a row at a given j
values.type: Int -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Maybe.Maybe (Array.Array a)

values.name: height
values.comment: Height of a given matrix
values.type: Matrix.Matrix a -> Int

values.name: indexedMap
values.comment: Apply a function, taking the `x, y` of every element in the matrix
values.type: (Int -> Int -> a -> b) -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Matrix.Matrix b

values.name: map
values.comment: Apply a function of every element in the matrix
values.type: (a -> b) -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Matrix.Matrix b

values.name: map2
values.comment: Apply a function to two matricies at once
values.type: (a -> b -> c) -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Matrix.Matrix b -> Maybe.Maybe (Matrix.Matrix c)

values.name: repeat
values.comment: Create a matrix of a given size `x y` with a default value of `v`
values.type: Int -> Int -> a -> Matrix.Matrix a

values.name: set
values.comment:
Set a value at a given `i, j` in the matrix and return the new matrix
  If the `i, j` is out of bounds then return the unmodified matrix
values.type: Int -> Int -> a -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Matrix.Matrix a

values.name: toIndexedArray
values.comment: Convert a matrix to an indexed array
values.type: Matrix.Matrix a -> Array.Array ( ( Int, Int ), a )

values.name: update
values.comment:
Update an element at `x, y` with the given update function
  If out of bounds, return the matrix unchanged
values.type: Int -> Int -> (a -> a) -> Matrix.Matrix a -> Matrix.Matrix a

values.name: width
values.comment: Width of a given matrix
values.type: Matrix.Matrix a -> Int
